title: Matplotlib Pyplot Interface Tutorial
description: This tutorial provides a step-by-step guide to using the pyplot interface in Matplotlib. The pyplot module is a collection of functions that make Matplotlib work like MATLAB, allowing you to easily create and customize plots. This tutorial assumes you have a basic understanding of Matplotlib and its concepts.
